titles.title: Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony in honor of the bicentennial of the birth of President Abraham Lincoln.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Capuano asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/28/2009--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Authorizes the use of the Capitol rotunda on February 12, 2009, for a ceremony in honor of the bicentennial of the birth of President Abraham Lincoln.
